website_summaries.verdict: If you’re just looking for a simple grill, this is a solid option for the price.
pros: High quality for a low cost
The smaller size makes it simple to store
cons: Some units ship with missing parts, most noticeably screws

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend my Charcoal Kettle Grll.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Charcoal Kettle Grll. It is easy to use and easy to clean. It grills food to perfection. It is very sturdy and a great value for the price. I use it twice a week and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I'm grilling with this year
customer_reviews.text: This grill is perfect size for 2-3 people. It's lightweight which means it's very portable. I have had several larger kettle grills and one smoker type over the years; this one suits for downsized grilling, but is by no means too small. For instance, I put a rib eye & two NY steaks on and had room for a few dogs or another steak. It IS shorter than your usual kettle grill. The charcoal bowl is closer to the grill,so adjust your cooking techniques accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: jeanie k

customer_reviews.title: Great tailgating grill
customer_reviews.text: The grill is perfect for tailgating. Easy to use and a nice size. The handle broke the first time we used it (it was most likely faulty), but the sellers sent a new one right away when I told them about it. The sellers actually contacted me before I could even reached out to them just to see if we liked the product! Excellent costumer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mama L

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill!
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill. Easy to put together. Enjoyed a great hamburger on it for the 4th of July. Easily had room for 13 good size patties on it. I had an issue with the handle being broken when I opened the box, but the seller made it right quickly and was pleasant to deal with. I recommend buying a cover for it so it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brazell

customer_reviews.title: light weight, portable size, charcoal starter
customer_reviews.text: I spent less than 15 mins to put it together. Assembly extremely easy. It's exactly the size that I expected. Easy to move around with the wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Clark

customer_reviews.title: Resonable price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a charcoal kettle grill for a long time as all of my family members loved to have barbecue together. This one looks nice with reasonable price and finally i got it. The assembling was quite easy if you followed the instructions guideline. I was pleased and happy with how well the grill cooks. We were enjoying our homemade grilled chicken, squid, steak etc...happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy jordan

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller/shorter than I realized & you should only ...
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller/shorter than I realized & you should only use traditional charcoal because my designer charcoal was never able to even out due to size, but it is a great little grill for the price. And this company is by far the best seller I’ve dealt with. They went out of their way to make me happy. I’ll be back!
customer_reviews.author: Carlita's Camp

customer_reviews.title: Small, and not the easiest to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Missing items right out of the box. And also damaged. I'm very upset and irritated because this grill was supposed to be for my sons birthday party. Hopefully the replacement will be here soon, if NOT I want my money back. EDITED REVIEW AFTER REPLACEMENT***** So. I got the replacement. It wasn't the easiest to put together, you have to kind of bend the metal pieces to get it to fit, the screws aren't tight, and the grill is actually very small. Is it worth $80? NO. It is actually pretty cheap and I'm very disappointed. Do yourself a favor and buy something else. I'd love my money back but I've already put it together and used it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat

customer_reviews.title: Check the dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: I got this grill for my husband for Christmas. He has not used it yet due to frigid winter weather. It’s shorter than I was expecting. The pictures are misleading as to it’s actual size. Make sure you check the dimensions before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kariane O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This grill is exactly what I wanted. Small enough for a single to grill a steak or two without breaking out a monster grill. It is easy to clean due to its small size. It is easily moved and can accommodate about 4 nice size steaks or 8-9 burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but seems like it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this grill without much research 3 days before a party, knowing it would arrive in time with Prime. The assembly instructions were pretty easy to follow, but I did have to punch one of the holes through that was not completely punched during manufacturing. It seems like a stiff wind will blow it over, but all of the important parts are there so it seems like it will do the job. The quality seems aligned with the inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Smh
customer_reviews.text: Not all that sturdy but it's not bad, the height is annoying. Have to hunch over and squat..smh..I've never had a pain in the behind grill in my life but this one is it... It doesn't stay heated! Tried moving around front and bottom vents to no success and I've even tried multiple charcoal / wood chips . But the same results. I dislike this grill but I paid for it so I shall use it until it falks apart (hopefully not while I'm cooking)
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Priced right.  Cheap price, simple, nothing special.  Put charcoal in light up and cook.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap, basic charcoal grill. This fit the bill. A little pain to put together, but not horrible. I got the wife to hold it, it was an almost impossible task alone. But I got what I wanted and expected. I would post a pic, but it looks exactly as shown. If you want a simple charcoal grill this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lumsden

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It's way to difficult to put together. The directions print was way to small as well as the pics. The handles broke. This sucks. I don't have enough hardware and it comes with NO TOOLS!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Love the height between a mini and a full size grill. I am able to sit and tend to the grilling yet it is wide enough to cook plenty of food on. You do have to add enough coals to get the grill as hot as you need. Otherwise you will be adding more half way through.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyearl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Got this because didn't wanna pay double yhe price for a Weber. I have a Jumbo Joe by Weber but wanted a taller grill. Material is about 2/3 the thickness of my Weber. It's a sturdy grill easy to assemble and well worth the price comparatively. It draws well, heats well.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Too many parts
customer_reviews.text: I like this little grill. Especially for the price. The only con is that in came in too many little pieces and took awhile to put together. Could have just gone to Walmart and spent a few dollars more for one that was already assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the upper air vent and found out after grill was assembled and box discarded which if i want get part i have to disassemble and fund a box and return it and buy another and hope all parts are there very unhappy about this and no way to contact vender
customer_reviews.author: MARK KOPICKI

customer_reviews.title: Not a good grill .
customer_reviews.text: If you think this looks like a weber... Its not...this grill barely keeps charcoal lit ... I had the chance to send it back. Came with a broken handle . low grade materials. I grill often and will be going back to Weber!
customer_reviews.author: Yazel

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal vs Gas
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to set up, the steaks and chops came out perfect. It kind of reminded me about the family picnics and cookouts we used to have a long time ago. And even though the gas grill is very fast, there is just that something, that a charcoal grill does do meat so much better.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great portable grill. Bought for our camping trip. It is lightweight and folded up nicely. Cooked our food as expected. We will use this grill for all our outdoor cook puts away from home. Very satisfied. Highly recommended for all camping and outdoor cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Complete Disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect grill for my family and I. However, upon assembling the grill we realised it was extremely off balanced. The four black round knots that hold the legs at the base of the grill are missing. They never made it to me! Unless I am going to completely destroy the base of my grill just to attach the legs, for the 25th Dec 2018, I need to source some alternatives. Such an inconvenience. Please rectify.
customer_reviews.author: Brí

customer_reviews.title: Small, but works ok
customer_reviews.text: Pretty small as described, but works ok so far. Works ok for dinner for a family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flimsy poorly made piece of junk! Next to my webber the metal is very thin and parts don't fit well together. If I had seen this in person I never would have purchased. Gonna have to replace very soon!
customer_reviews.author: gretchenybarra

customer_reviews.title: Super Bowl cookout
customer_reviews.text: This grill was a little shorter than I envisioned, but it worked great and produced a lot of delicious barbeque for our Super Bowl party. Can't wait for the weather to warm up so we can have another go at it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: not qo
customer_reviews.text: it is much smaller than the photos; about half the size of a regular grill. it is difficult to keep hot enough to cook anything quickly. (45 minutes for a small chicken cut. ) its probably best to get a $20 grill from CVS than this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hough

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This grill was a total piece of crap. Missing pieces, not sturdy at all. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ronale d johnson

customer_reviews.title: PoorQuality
customer_reviews.text: If there was a way that can give 0 star I would for this product apparently I just opened the box I start using it but the material was not good quality .sad I couldn’t even return this product also it’s too small for the size it’s discribed .i would revoking to go to home depo and buy a better product than this.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Had to return item
customer_reviews.text: Not as shown in photo!~ The legs were WAY TOO SHORT - apparently, this is a table grill!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: this is a miniature BBQ
customer_reviews.text: The photo is misleading. As other reviewers have pointed out, this is a tiny barbecue -- only 17 inches high. An adult would have cook while seated. Or place the barbecue up on cinder blocks. The size of the grilling surface is only slightly larger than a frying pan. It can handle a dinner for two or three people. But if you're cooking for a larger party, get another grill.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Bly

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: Got for my husband for Father's Day and he loves it. Put it together in just a few minutes and it does the job of grilling a couple steaks when we get the chance. He hasn't made any complaints so we're happy with this grill. Buyer beware it is short.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Okay buy
customer_reviews.text: Good size for a family of four. The only bad thing is doesn’t retain heat well. It is a short grill so beware if your tall. But it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy T

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: The grill is nice, and is smaller than I thought. I attribute this to me not reading it is shorter than normal height. It's very easy to put together, but once it is, you can sit in a chair and bbq. So it's shorter than I expected. But quality is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: the package and product quality are both really good. The instruction is pretty easy to follow. I feel really satisfied with this product! Can’t wait to have a barbecue with my family!
customer_reviews.author: bighead

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I find this grill to be about perfect for cooking one or two steaks at a time. You might be able to handle one more but 4 would be really tight (or they better be small portions). Directions leave a little to be desired but I stumbled through. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought my hubby this as a gift and he loved it! It’s easy to assemble. He put it together in about ten minutes without having to read the manual. It’s the perfect size and easy to store. It’s perfect for a little get together.
customer_reviews.author: Sariah deoliveira

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Very cheaply made. Missing parts. They did not cutout holes where handles go. Half the nuts missing. Fortunately my husband had nuts and screws that where missing. Do not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Ritsuka Kyo- chan

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Webber but....
customer_reviews.text: This little whipper snapper does exactly what the overpriced webber does. This is as good as it gets for a nice small portable grill. Only little problem is that the bottom rack is flimsy. I don't find this to be a problem though since I don't transport it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Baker

customer_reviews.title: Portable charcoal grill
customer_reviews.text: I received this and was excited to cook 0n it , but half the screws were missing parts were missing. My husband had to go buy me parts just to put it together. Please take more care with your packaging. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Mom

customer_reviews.title: I'm disabled and the size is great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of it but it s a little wobbly . I have to modify a little to get the legs tighter, no big .
customer_reviews.author: william neumaier

customer_reviews.title: picture is mis leading
customer_reviews.text: bbq is much smaller than what the picture shows, its only 23 inches high. there is enough room on the grate to cook, but we have to place a wood platform underneath it so as not to kneel down to cook.
customer_reviews.author: ROCKMAN

customer_reviews.title: But I should have known better. Wish I did
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have this little guy a chance. But I should have known better. Wish I did. First of all it is way smaller then expected. Can only do one piece of meat at a time. Second the grill is all lopsided. The grill won't stay or clamp on to the base. Bummed out on this purchase. Wouldn't recommend it. Gotta save up and buy one that's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Looked very nice and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because it was missing screws. Looked very nice and worth the money. I’m just too old to be out trying to find the right screws these days.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I've put together a lot of stuff over the years. Between missing parts, missing screws and unclear directions, I ended up returning it. Not Amazon's fault. This grill is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: It is compact and it works well.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to return to charcoal grilling and wanted something small and easily stored. Wish it was taller. But it is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Does What We Need It To Do.
customer_reviews.text: Since we are empty nesters, we do not need a lot of grill space so this grill completely serves our needs. Would prefer it was a little bit taller and did not have an indentation on the cover that just collects rain water. But as I said, it does meet our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for someone else who said it was easy to put together and works great
customer_reviews.author: Pedskr

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this product a "One Star" review due to missing bolts. The seller contacted me immediately and told me that 4 bolts are pre-attached to the legs. I am not sure why they do this, but that is exactly where they were! It was then very easy to put together. Thank you for the prompt resolution!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Decent grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a good grill for the price. But it’s not very sturdy and some parts did not fit correctly. It was a little loose. All in all, good temporary use!!
customer_reviews.author: Linhda Syed

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke on 1st use, didn't even drop lid, just broke in half
customer_reviews.text: I could have got the same item for $15 cheaper but I wasn't paying attention, s that's my fault. But the handle broke in half on the 1st use that's unacceptable . Can't recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Dafisherman

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and finally unpacked it it’s missing a whole six screws to put it together now I need to run to the hardware store so I can assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: srz232

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a small table top size grill. I should have paid more attention to the size but for 45.00 I figured it would be bigger...Not a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I like the grill
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the grill and look forward to getting alot of use out of it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: brenda thompson

customer_reviews.title: Baby Grill is a champ
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit longer to build than I would have liked. HOWEVER, this grill is awesome. For this price it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works good once warmed
customer_reviews.text: It’s old school it was difficult to start the fire
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this grill a couple of months ago. And I now got a around to opening it... and well it was missing two of its legs. I cant even use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Jerl Steiniger

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Been using this grill for about 6 months maybe twice a week and the coal go out as soon as you cover it. Air doesn’t circulate well. Idk what to do. I’ve been charcoal grilling for over 8 years and this has stumped me.
customer_reviews.author: Kolten Striano

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We have used this portable charcoal grill couple times since we got it. It's easy to assemble, easy to use and easy to clean. We have propane grill too, but personally I like charcoal better. It's smaller than propane grill but good size for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Char Flores

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with the size. i thought it would sit higher off the ground. its not very tall. Works well though for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend. UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: Not what we expected. Would not recommend. UPDATED Review-The issues I had with this product were due to my misreading the specifications on this product. The grill itself worked fine and we used it when camping this summer. The customer service offered by this company is stellar and I would not hesitate to order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Badger

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the picture depicts
customer_reviews.text: It's ok however the picture of size is misleading I am 5' 3 and it stands just above my knees. It much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I decided to buy this with no hesitation because it’s something that we will use a lot for BBQ and I think that the price isn’t bad
customer_reviews.text: Where I live ACs and Grills sell out fast. There’s no way to get them until later in the summer. I decided to buy this with no hesitation because it’s something that we will use a lot for BBQ and I think that the price isn’t bad
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger pit, but this is great for small meals. I'm a 66 year old female and I like that I'm able to move it anywhere in my yard and cook a couple of steaks or burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Primo67

customer_reviews.title: Small but MIGHTY
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our older charcoal grill. We were skeptical because it turned out to be smaller than we thought but I must say, we’ve used it every weekend and throughout the week this whole summer and it’s been great! I recommend this grill especially for those with smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Barbecue
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the barbecue. He and his family use it at least once a week and are happy with it's durability. Very happy. Thank you for a good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila L. Darsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice, short
customer_reviews.text: Like the diameter,but wish it were higher off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Phx BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me the wife and two kids to cook up a quick bbq dinner. Holds a medium bag of charcoal. Only downside is the legs don’t fold so to transport it you have to take the legs off by unscrewed the whole thing. Bigger size folding grill at Walmart for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin11

customer_reviews.title: mini barbeque
customer_reviews.text: The barbeque was a lot smaller than expected. It seems more like a hibachi. Directions show a picture that turns out not to be the way to put it together. But it still barbeques meat.
customer_reviews.author: Diana McNeel

customer_reviews.title: product is ok
customer_reviews.text: would not recommend this, it was difficult to put together and we have a hard time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Hilbun

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to grill 3 steaks as my mom and her husband requested. They said it was easy to assemble, and sent me pictures of the yummy looking steaks. Dinner at their house from now on!
customer_reviews.author: JessiA

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice size. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice size. Easy to assemble. We used it once this summer and it work great cooking our food. Wish I would have purchased it early in the Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill made with Stainless
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and is sturdy a very nice grill for cooking and small enough to take places I like the way the legs go in and the fact they are stainless steel legs instead of aluminum
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Mickel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill for the price, purchased for our college student, he is enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: John in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: It is a little short but nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the shorter and bit awkward height but otherwise was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. All of the pieces were included, which is not always the case. Its a good grill for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Everett

customer_reviews.title: Grill Meat and Vegetables Real Nice
customer_reviews.text: We had a backyard party three times since in NJ and I must say the amount it holds you would be surprised plus very easy to clean and store
customer_reviews.author: Only1Empo

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This came with only two out of four legs and a bent ash pan.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Need sturdier parts.
customer_reviews.text: Handle on lid broke second time I used it plus the hook that lid hangs from couldn’t handle the weight of lid. Not something I’d order again.
customer_reviews.author: DGONZALES

customer_reviews.title: It’s short
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill! Only complaint is how tall it is, it’s rather short. Other than that it’s worth the price and has enough grilling space for enough meat for our whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cost vs quality
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived with broken top handle, but I glued it back together and it will hopefully hold up. Haven't used it yet, but seems like a decent inexpensive option. Size is sufficient for no more than 3 people in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeonabike

customer_reviews.title: Too small Grill
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected for the price. I am 5'3 and I have to bend down to grill. Should have been less than $30
customer_reviews.author: Winona Sewell Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very short the metal clip that attached the cover to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very short the metal clip that attached the cover to the grill does not stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: Video Man

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: unable to be used because its missing 2 legs. wasting 52 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Cherubiel

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it twice. It had missing pieces both times.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Portable grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine grill. It is portable, so is not as large or tall as other grills but that is quite okay. I am satisfied with the purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Koepke

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s okay but oddly enough we’ve had cheaper grills that have done a better job. You can only cook at one temperature on this grill so there is no way to slow cook or marinade anything after you cook it on the high heat.
customer_reviews.author: Genia

customer_reviews.title: Good grill
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability this grill has. It's Winter now so I don't really want to stay in the cold to use it though.
customer_reviews.author: YrX

customer_reviews.title: Defected purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very eager to receive my outdoor grill! Although whEn i looked at my grill is noticed the grill was defected on the bottom. There is a big dent on the bottom of the grill where i am to screw other pieces to it. If i attach the other prices the grill is lopsided. I am not pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a grill!
customer_reviews.text: It's a grill... but this guy is shorter than I expected. Not big enough of a deal for me to take off a star but just know.
customer_reviews.author: PHIIIIIL

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to cook a whole rack of ribs and small enough to tuck away. I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Im new to grilling and it seemed intimidating but this portable charcoal grill made it easy. I love the hell out of this grill. I live in a building so leaving it out doors was not an option, I pick it up and bring it inside the apartment and tuck it away in my kitchen corner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it appears
customer_reviews.text: This grill is quite small. The photos are somewhat deceptive as the legs of the thing are short, thus making the grill surface look bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rob

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: So far I can’t use my grill. I’m missing half of the screws, washers and bolts. Waiting for replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: TINA KNAPP

customer_reviews.title: check your bolts
customer_reviews.text: The grill is what I wanted .when I got it the wrong bolts were supplied but they replaced them with no problems thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The reviews seem faked
customer_reviews.text: This product is massively over rated. Reality is you can go to your local dollar store and buy a similar product for less. You could also get one from any local store for the same amount that is taller and bigger. Don’t spend this much money on something I just saw today at lidless for 20$. Same specs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Portable Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, portable grill which is both functional and convenient. Came with all necessary parts and clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when we downsized to a smaller place. It’s perfect for my small patio. I’m still getting used to how to cook on it but it’s the perfect size to cook for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: For the price and size I couldn’t be happier. It’s two of us so don’t need something really big but plenty of room for hot dogs and hamburgers. Surface area is nice size just sits lower to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Paula L. Blankfard

customer_reviews.title: It is very small and would probably be best for two people but there isn't enough room to ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have actually paid attention to the size of this grill. It is very small and would probably be best for two people but there isn't enough room to cook food for 4-6 people.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little person
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably short-looks like a kids toy grill. Too embarrassed for the neighbors to see it-hidden in my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nena S Hisle

customer_reviews.title: Compact.  Grill.  Done.
customer_reviews.text: Comes as advertised. Perfect sized grill for those who aren't looking to own huge grills. Great for tailgates or casual barbecues.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ramacho

product_meta.title: BEAU JARDIN Portable Charcoal Grill for Outdoor 18 inch Barbecue Grill and Smoker Heat Control Round BBQ Kettle Outdoor Picnic Patio Backyard Camping Tailgating Steel Cooking Grate for Steak Chicken
feature_bullets: PORTABLE CHARCOAL GRILL：Portable charcoal grills with dimension of 17.5 inch diameter by 24-inch high without lid. Durable 17. inch diameter of BBQ grill plated steel cooking grate provides ample cooking surface for any meal of your grilling. A perfect Go-anywhere kettle grill with two bowl handles and durable wheels for outdoor camping by getting your friends or family hovering around the grill, hungry for tempting charcoal flavor of burnt food. Screws and washers are in the bottom of the legs.

PERFECT HEAT CONTROL&RETENTION: Rust-resistant adjustable aluminum air vent damper allows for heat control without hassle to lift the lid. Two handles of the cooking grate make you easy to lift it to add or adjusting charcoal. Heavy-duty durable plated steel charcoal grate design withstands the heat of any charcoal fire for a direct or indirect grilling with this charcoal grate. The round porcelain-enameled coating bowl and lid retains heat well to flow for even grilling.

EASY TO USE&CLEAN: The inside lid hanger hook under the lid could be hung on one bowl handle without hassle to lift it or put it on the ground. The ash leak under the bowl and the ash catcher become the best choice to be one-touch cleaning system. You just need to rotate the ash leak to move the ash down into the ash catcher for easy ash disposal and cleaning. The durable wheels make this charcoal BBQ grill to be easy to move and transport for outdoor picnic tailgate camping.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE&PERFECT GRILLING: This portable charcoal barbecue grill is easy to assemble with step by step instruction. The thick grilling bowl and lid with porcelain-enameled coating provides precise heat retention for grilling tastier food. Just adjust the air vent damper to any grilling condition you’d like. You will love superior smoky flavor and then enjoy your wonderful meal of filet mignon, burgers, steaks, chickens, chop, turkey, summer squash, onion, asparagus, and shrimp.
CUSTOMER CARE: We are dedicated to provide premium products for you and offer impeccable customer care to you. Don’t wait any longer and just enjoy your ideal products today!
